title: Client error - severe
body: 5th time ive had this error occur it keeps happening and ive seen no other mention of it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Wow, that's pretty odd.

Could you do the following for me,

*  [Run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), if the issue still persists move on to the next point.
* Run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article, let me know if this helps.
